page.title: 01REF:04040096.AREA REVIEW.
page.content: This is an area bounded by the large conurbations of Bournemouth,Poole and Wimborne.Kinson,on the outskirts of Bournemouth,is densely populated with good community facilities.Despite this there are still traces of the original village and its green to be seen.The busy Kinson road is bounded by many shops and carries heavy traffic all the year to Bournemouth,Poole and the West. In direct contrast the area has much open country laid to horticulture and mixed farming.A number of working farms lie in the region.The river Stour winds its way through pasture land providing pleasant meanders, fishing and boating.Hampreston Village is a contrast to the housing estates of Kinson.Dudsbury Rings give evidence of earlier habitations.
